customGeneratorText.description: Generate custom text for any purpose using the EasyPeasy AI template engine

props.name: keywords
props.description: What do you want to generate? (max 1000 characters)

props.name: extra1
props.description: Additional context or background information (optional, max 1000 characters)

props.name: language
props.description: Language for the generated text (default: English)

props.name: shouldUseGPT4
props.description: Use GPT-4 model for generation (may incur higher costs)

generateAiImage.description: Generate AI images based on text prompts using various models and styles

props.name: prompt
props.description: Description of the image you want to generate

props.name: model
props.description: AI model to use for image generation

props.name: style
props.description: Art style or aesthetic for the generated image (e.g., "oil painting", "watercolor", "cyberpunk")

props.name: artist
props.description: Art style inspired by a specific artist (e.g., "Van Gogh", "Picasso")

props.name: useHD
props.description: Generate image in HD quality (may incur higher costs)

props.name: image
props.description: Optional URL to a reference image for style consistency

getAiTranscription.description: Generate AI transcriptions from audio files with speaker detection and enhanced quality options

props.name: url
props.description: URL to the audio file to transcribe

props.name: name
props.description: Name or title for this transcription

props.name: audio_type
props.description: Type of audio content being transcribed

props.name: detect_speakers
props.description: Automatically detect and identify different speakers in the audio

props.name: enhanced_quality
props.description: Use enhanced quality processing for better transcription accuracy
